name: Fish Mania
description:
Fast paced fishing action!

  • Fish across 17 different lakes 
  • Catch 17 different kinds of fish 
  • Try to catch the great white shark
  • Catch the most fish and get the highest score

 Controls

  • Press spacebar to start game 
  • Use keyboard arrows to move boat
  • Left button click to select lake
  • Use mouse to move bobber and catch fish
